bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The Methodist Church of Savona was built in 1843. Previous to this services had been held in the schoolhouse by the Reverend Mr. Story and other early preachers. Among the oldest members were Elisha McCoy and the Hughes family, headed by Issachar Hughes.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This one volume pre-printed register lists baptisms, marriages, probationers, members, and classes.

did.unittitle: Record of Members of the Methodist Episcopal Church of Savona Circuit

scopecontent.p: Lists date of baptism; name of the baptised person, and, if an infant, the name of its parents or guardians; the date of birth of the baptised person, if an infant; the residence of the party baptised; the name of the officiating minister; and the names of the witnesses.
Includes the date, name of the parties, their residences, place of marriage, the officiating minister and witnesses.
Listed are the date, name, age, condition, residence, class leader and remarks for each probationer.

Includes names, residence, date and mode of reception, and the name of the class leader, revised several times. A list of preachers, stewards and leaders is after the first list. After the first list the names are alphabetized.
Names, date, leader, remarks and where the class met are listed for 1-4 classes.
